title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2102.2 - Effective date of orders adjusting rents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2102.2 - Effective date of orders adjusting rents

State Regulations

No order increasing or decreasing a maximum rent
previously established pursuant to this Subchapter shall be effective prior to
the date on which the order is issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2102.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
